driver = navigate_to_commercial_insurance = None @allure.epic("人力资源设置") @allure.feature("薪资管理设置") @allure.story("薪资分类管理-商业保险标准设置") @allure.description("编辑商业保险标准") @pytest.mark.parametrize("driver",['chrome'],indirect=True) def test_modify(driver,navigate_to_commercial_insurance): wait = WebDriverWait(driver, 20) time.sleep(3) try: #点击编辑 wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable( (By.XPATH, '//tbody/tr[1]/td[contains(@class,"col--last")]//button[contains(@class,"font-primary")]'))).click() #点击保存 wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable( (By.XPATH, "//div[@aria-label='商业保险标准']/div[contains(@class, 'el-dialog__footer')]//button[contains(@class, 'el-button--success')]"))).click() # 提示 text=wait.until(EC.element_to_be_clickable( (By.XPATH, '//p[@class="el-message__content"]'))) if text.text != "更新成功": highlight_element(driver, text) allure.attach(driver.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="商业保险标准修改失败截图", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG) reset_element(driver, text) assert text.text == "更新成功" except Exception as e: > raise e C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\test\系统设置\人力资源设置\薪资管理设置\薪资分类管理\test_commercial_insurance.py:236: _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\test\系统设置\人力资源设置\薪资管理设置\薪资分类管理\test_commercial_insurance.py:221: in test_modify (By.XPATH, '//tbody/tr[1]/td[contains(@class,"col--last")]//button[contains(@class,"font-primary")]'))).click() ^^^^^^^ D:\t\.venv\Lib\site-packages\selenium\webdriver\remote\webelement.py:120: in click self._execute(Command.CLICK_ELEMENT) D:\t\.venv\Lib\site-packages\selenium\webdriver\remote\webelement.py:573: in _execute return self._parent.execute(command, params) ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ D:\t\.venv\Lib\site-packages\selenium\webdriver\remote\webdriver.py:454: in execute self.error_handler.check_response(response) _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ self = response = {'status': 400, 'value': '{"value":{"error":"element click intercepted","message":"element click intercepted: Element ...ff7e300f558+11256]\\n\\tBaseThreadInitThunk [0x0x7ffab4797374+20]\\n\\tRtlUserThreadStart [0x0x7ffab63dcc91+33]\\n"}}'} def check_response(self, response: dict[str, Any]) -> None: """Checks that a JSON response from the WebDriver does not have an error. :Args: - response - The JSON response from the WebDriver server as a dictionary object. :Raises: If the response contains an error message.
